T02D2421:37a-1: bi sha ni barnam bha ba na nam kra mam n'a ma /
T02D2421:37a-3: dug sel bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2421:37a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2421:37a-5: phyi dang nang gi dug bzhi'i rtsa ba ni //
T02D2421:37a-6: sems can rnams kyi srog gcod 'khyam pa'i rgyu //
T02D2421:37a-7: de rnams sel thabs zhal nas zhal brgyud pa //
T02D2421:37a-8: aa ram bdag gis sgom lugs bshad //
T02D2421:37a-9: thog mar nang gi dug sel bzhi rnams la //
T02D2421:37a-10: zhe sdang gnyen po bdag gzhan grub med la //
T02D2421:37b-0: chags @37b ba'i gnyen ngo mi gtsang rang lus sman //
T02D2421:37b-1: nga rgyal gnyen po 'di dag mi rtag pa //
T02D2421:37b-2: phrag dog 'dus pa'i nad ni spang byas nas //
T02D2421:37b-3: gti mug gnyen po bla la lha nyid dang //
T02D2421:37b-4: rnal 'byor tshad med bzhi ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2421:37b-5: de yis bdag gzhan nad sel nad med 'grub //
T02D2421:37b-6: phyi ltar tshad med 'bras bu rang snying dbus //
T02D2421:37b-7: tha yig dkar bo ba tshan lnga pas brgyan //
T02D2421:37b-8: ye shes bya khyung phyag rdor snying por ldan //
T02D2421:37b-9: bdud kyi gdan la ham sa'i bya khyung ste //
T02D2421:37b-10: h'um 'byung sna tshogs gser gyi gshog pa can //
T02D2421:37b-11: dbu skra bcas pa'i khyung zhal dmar po ste //
T02D2421:37b-12: rva gnyis nyi zla'i thig le dag gis brgyan //
T02D2421:37b-13: bus mo se ral brang dang lte ba dkar //
T02D2421:37b-14: 'jigs byed klu rgyal rnams kyis brgyan pa bsgom //
T02D2421:37b-15: zhal nas ham sa'i bdud rtsi dkar ser 'dzag / ha phus zhal nas dug gi rlangs pa 'thul //
T02D2421:37b-16: de ltar bsgoms shing sngags kyi glu nyid blang //
T02D2421:37b-17: aom aa ra ha tta gha 'i dza'i /
T02D2421:37b-20: tu hi bhi tu ka ba lam /
T02D2421:37b-23: ne sa su ma sa ne /
T02D2421:37b-24: aa bha ru ha bhu n+ya /
T02D2421:37b-25: bhanti bhu ye sa la ye /
T02D2421:37b-28: ae larwa bi la da na /
T02D2421:37b-30: tsan dhe tsa na dha bhi sa na /
T02D2421:37b-36: aa sa pa yi nam me /
T02D2421:37b-41: ma dz'am nam ka ro yi /
T02D2421:37b-49: ra ha ri rakshi dza yi sv'a h'a /
T02D2421:37b-52: rna bar glu len chur bzlas byin pa yis //
T02D2421:37b-53: skad cig gcig la dug nad sel bar 'gyur //
T02D2421:37b-54: da ni bskyed rim rdzogs rim 'di ltar bsgom //
T02D2421:37b-55: bde chen nam mkhar sam ste ham yig gis //
T02D2421:37b-56: zla ba'i thig le dkar la gangs ltar bsil //
T02D2421:37b-57: nam mkha'i dbyings nas bdud rtsi'i 'od zer ni ;
T02D2421:37b-58: / dkar ser 'dzags te khong stong lus 'di dag
T02D2421:37b-59: / rkang la zhugs pa'i phyi nang dug rnams ni
T02D2421:37b-60: // rdzogs pa'i rim pas sel 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D2421:37b-61: zla tshes dkar po thig les brgyan pa ni //
T02D2421:37b-62: sems nyid bdud rtsi dbus su dkar dmar ltar //
T02D2421:37b-63: snying pa'i kha sbyor pad dbus sbyong byed na//
T02D2421:38a-0: @38a * // de yis phyi nang dug sel byang chub bsgrub //
T02D2421:38a-1: phyi yi dug rnams sel ba'i sman sbyor ni //
T02D2421:38a-2: mtshan mo'i sman ni srang gcig 'o mar bskol //
T02D2421:38a-3: dug zin rnams la btang bas dug 'dren no //
T02D2421:38a-4: mtshan mo la ma dang sbrul mi mthang bskol te //
T02D2421:38a-5: lo dug sbyar dug rnams ni sel 'gyur ro ;
T02D2421:38a-6: / rig pa 'di ni ras la lan bdun bzlas //
T02D2421:38a-7: dug can nad pa de yis bkab byas nas //
T02D2421:38a-8: de nas chu yi snod la rkang lag bcug / sngags 'di bzlas shing bra ba cing gdab //
T02D2421:38a-9: aom na ma sha ba ra nam /
T02D2421:38a-10: sha ba ri kum ra ka nam //
T02D2421:38a-15: de ltar bzlas shing byang chub sems bsgom mo //
T02D2421:38a-16: gdams ngag 'di bstan dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
T02D2421:38a-17: gang thob de yis 'gro drug sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2421:38a-18: nyon mongs sgrib pa dag cing byang chub sems //
T02D2421:38a-19: dri med mkha' ltar phyag rgya chen po thob par
T02D2421:38a-20: shog / dug sel bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya
